properties.prefix:
Animal Specimen


  • There are specific field-sets for recommended aspects of description. The “type” sub-field is used to fine tune the meaning, the “value” sub-field is used to indicate a key-word or phrase for that aspect, and the “note” sub-field is used for a longer text which amplifies the meaning or indicates a special consideration.

  • If there is no specific field-set for your purpose, use “keyword” for typed descriptive words or phrases and “note” for typed descriptive texts.

properties.description: This is the primary way of naming this specimen in the system.
properties.title: Primary Title

properties.description: Use this to identify the species of the specimen.
properties.title: Taxonomic Name

properties.description: The name of the author and year of publication of a particular scientific name, e.g., Linnaeus, 1758.
properties.title: Scientific Name Authorship

properties.description: Describe the type of variant name such as sub-order or sub-genus.
properties.title: Variant Type

properties.description: Use this if there are other names associated with the specimen.
properties.title: Alternate Titles

properties.description: This is a general description or abstract about what you know about the specimen in the context of your research.
properties.title: Summary Description

properties.description: Keywords, subject terms, key phrases classification codes, etc., ideally drawn from a thesaurus, which classifies or describes the specimen and for which there are no more specific fields in the form.
properties.title: Keywords

properties.description: The type of keyword, such as Subject, Geographic or Temporal. Leaving type blank would imply general keywords.
properties.title: Keyword Type

properties.description: Formal strings of characters that are used to uniquely identify the specimen in various systems. This can also be used to create a formal identifier for the specimen for your project.
properties.title: Identifiers

properties.description: The name of the system or standard for which the identifier was created.
properties.title: Identifier Type

properties.description: A statement of the ownership and/or access rights associated with the parent element or a reference to such a statement.
properties.title: Rights

properties.description: The type of rights being described (ie Access rights, Use rights, etc.)
properties.title: Rights Type

properties.description: Other entities that are related to the specimen, such as the name of its parent
properties.title: Relations

properties.description: General notes that provide descriptions for other aspects relevant to your understanding of the specimen, and for which there are no more specific fields in the form.
properties.title: Taxon Notes

properties.description: This can be used to register specific dates associated with the specimen, such as the year it was collected.
properties.title: Time Period

properties.description: The type of time period such as Date Collected.
properties.title: Time Period Type

properties.description: A textual date such as "the 20th century" or "the Mesazoic Era".
properties.title: Textual Date

properties.description: Specific numeric dates associated with the specimen being described.
properties.title: Numeric Dates

properties.description: Spatial location information about the specimen being described, such as place of collection or current storage.
properties.title: Geographic Information

properties.description: The type of place being described such as, the Collection place or the Storage location.
properties.title: Place Type

properties.description: The type of location being described (ie Habitat, Continent, Country, State, County, Municipality, Locality, etc.)
properties.title: Geographic Area Type

properties.description: The date associated with the place being described.
properties.title: Time Period

properties.description: A textual date such as "20th Century" or "the Mesozoic Era".
properties.title: Textual Date

properties.description: A numeric date associated with the place being described.
properties.title: Numeric Date

properties.description: Notes about the Place Date being described.
properties.title: Place Date Notes

properties.description: Notes about the Place being described.
properties.title: Place Notes

properties.description: This is used to identify people or organizations which have a special relationship to the specimen. For example, the person who first identified it, or an organization which included it in their collection.
properties.title: Related People and Organizations

properties.description: The role of the person related to the specimen, such as “collector”.
properties.title: Role

properties.description: The name of the person.
properties.title: Person Name

properties.description: The role of the organization related to the specimen, such as “repository” or “owner”.
properties.title: Role

properties.description: The name of the organization.
properties.title: Organization Name

properties.description: This element is used to identify physical characteristics associated with the specimen.
properties.title: Physical Description

properties.description: The type of thing being described such as life stage, sex, type status, etc.
properties.title: Physical Description Type

properties.description: Description of the processes or methods used in the preparation of the specimen.
properties.title: Treatment

properties.description: The type of treatment applied to the entity. For example, sampling protocol.
properties.title: Treatment Type

properties.description: Brief text describing the treatment.
properties.title: Treatment Description

properties.description: Information about the size, weight of the specimen. Use the measurement text for a free-form description, use repeats of the measurement element for specific dimensions.
properties.title: Measurements

properties.description: A textual description of a measurement such as “L 12 inches; H 6 inches”.
properties.title: Measurement Text

properties.description: A measurement intended to be a single dimension using a combination of the type, value and units attributes.
properties.title: Measurement

properties.description: The type of measurement such as height, width, circumference, depth or number of components.
properties.title: Measurement Type

properties.description: The value of the measurement.
properties.title: Measurement Value

properties.description: The unit of measure such as feet, inches, meters or units.
properties.title: Measurement Unit

properties.description: The date associated with the measurement being described.
properties.title: Measurement Date

properties.description: A textual date such as "20th Century" or "the Mesazoic Era".
properties.title: Textual Date

properties.description: The date associated with the measurement being described.
properties.title: Numeric Date

properties.description: Explanatory text on the accuracy of the set of measurements.
properties.title: Measurement Accuracy

properties.description: Notes pertaining to the set of measurements.
properties.title: Measurement Notes
